oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The |nu'she bird calls at sunrise. There is a description of its appearance and call. 1) p.9875v: Tamme observed this himself; a note by !nanni referring to his drawing of 8 July 1881 which pictures a Dui plant: a description of its flowers and fruit (see IZIKO_SAMLB_!nBook4), 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-11.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The |nushe
